homeContent.greeting: Welcome to our brand new online showcase !
homeContent.text:
Do not insert too much text into this dynamic textfield, because this is only the introductory (home) section.
Feel free to use HTML tags, this description textfield is HTML-formatted. You can use HTML colored font tags.
Add URL Links easily, directly inside XML. If you like to use Unordered Lists, look what you can do with them:
  • FIRST LIST ITEM - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit sociis, penatibus sis ticidunt.
  • SECOND LIST ITEM - Donec ut suscipit mi. Sed ultrices tristique diam, tincidunt, viverra vulputate nullis.
  • THIRD LIST ITEM - Fusce vestibulum parturient montes porttitor mauris lacinia moellis! Duis elit lorem.
  • FOURTH LIST ITEM - Nunc eros leo, semper eu tincidunt nec. Cras odio nibh, tincidunt ic condimentum.
